OrgName: FCB Worldwide, Inc.’s agencies of Area 23, Neon, Prohealth, FCB Health, and FCB Garfinkel
activities: FCB Worldwide, Inc.’s agencies of Area 23, Neon, Prohealth, FCB Health, and FCB Garfinkel are advertising agencies that may receive personally identifiable information about client contacts in the European Union and Switzerland, and consultants and certain other third parties that the agencies engage in the European Union and Switzerland
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Client contacts, consultants and other third parties. May be manually processed.
privacyprograms: Direct Marketing Association Safe Harbor Program
recoursemech: Direct Marketing Association (DMA) Safe Harbor Program
